title: oh look it's a RGM I won't play while I wait for URF
body: Rito plz. I hate Poro King. I literally won't play league this weekend because I hate this garbage mode. Meanwhile, I'm sad that you are trying to 'fix' something that ain't broke. Plz stop making a bad season even worse.

replies.body:
It kinda of is a boring RGM... I mean after like 3-4 times in the last three months, I'm just clicking random champion and locking whatever.

First time Viktor and Zed so far this week.

I believe A.R.URF is coming at the end of the month

Anyway, I agree.  i play some poro king.  I get over it quick.  I can play URF all day.
At least as of a couple months ago, it was their second-most-played RGM.  Sorry it's not your thing.

As someone who loves to play ARAM, I don't mind Poro King at all. I guess some game modes will cater to people with different tastes. For example, someone who used to be a hardcore Dominion player will probably like Ascension more than URF. Just wait until next week, or better yet, pretend the mode isn't even there and play regular League like you normally do.
